title: The 20 most important interpretations of visions of meteors in the sky by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of sightings of meteorites in the skyMeteorites are igneous rocks that appear in the sky because they touch the atmosphere, but seeing meteors in a dream has many different meanings. When meteorites fall in a dream, this has different interpretations regarding their continued presence in the sky, and this is what we will learn in the following lines. Interpretation of sightings Meteors in the skyWhen a person sees meteors in a dream in the sky, this may symbolize that he will do charitable work that will benefit the poor and needy. If the dreamer sees meteors in the sky, this may indicate that he will get closer to Almighty God and repent for committing sins. If the dreamer is experiencing problems And disagreements with close ones and friends and seeing meteors directly in the sky, this is a sign of his arrival in the womb, disputes end and reconciliation can be made between them. Seeing meteors moving quickly in the sky is a sign of the death of a person of great status whose death will affect many people. Interpretation of seeing meteors in The Sky by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing meteors in the sky to mean that the dreamer will improve his material and moral conditions in the coming period. When a person sees in a dream a group of meteors in the sky, this may indicate an increase in goodness and blessing in money. Seeing meteors burning in The sky is a sign of some skirmishes with enemies, but in the end good will triumph over evil. A dream about unstable meteorites in the sky means that the ruler of the country is an unjust person who does not want the country to be safe and stable. Interpretation of seeing meteors in the sky for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees meteors in the sky, This may indicate that she would have gone in the wrong direction and committed many obligatory duties, but she would refrain from doing so. Seeing meteors in the sky in an unmarried girl could be a sign that she will reach a great scientific position. If a girl sees meteors and meteors in a dream, she may This indicates that she may marry a man of high status or marry a person who is famous among the people. A dream about meteorites for a girl could be a sign that a wedding or engagement date is approaching, or that someone close to the girl will soon announce it. What is the interpretation of a dream about seeing many Stars in the sky for a single woman? Seeing many stars in the sky for a girl can lead to goodness and she will hear a lot of happy and positive news in the coming days. When an unmarried girl sees a group of stars in the sky and is happy to see them, this is a sign that God will compensate her for her painful past with a husband. Well, she lives a happy life with him, full of love and good feelings. If the dreamer sees in a dream that she is looking at the stars in the sky, this is an indication that she will achieve her desires and goals that she sought and put in a lot of effort and exhaustion until she reached them. To dream of stars in a dream is a sign that the girl You can start a new business project through which you will gain a lot of experience and make a lot of profits and money. Interpretation of seeing meteors in the sky for a married woman When a married woman sees meteors in the sky, it means

title: Interpretation of a dream about salary or getting a pension in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a salary means that there is an opportunity to earn a wide livelihood and it has other interpretations such as receiving a salary, an unemployed person receiving a salary, or distributing a retirement salary. Interpretation of a salary in a dream Seeing a salary in a dream shows that the dreamer carries a sufficient amount of money and will benefit from the opportunities available to work until... He becomes financially capable. At the same time, the vision indicates the beginning of the initial steps to start a large investment among family members. Seeing a salary in the dreamer of the vision indicates that he will shift his focus from work to business life. It is also interpreted as being passionately moving to take another path in life, and that of He saw a salary in a dream that does not interrupt his livelihood, but rather it will be permanent and long. The vision also shows that a small investment and saving part of the money will be a reason for achieving a large profit. The vision contains a warning that the dreamer must make more efforts to accumulate the amount that he will earn with the sweat of his brow to ensure his daily livelihood. And his family. The vision also indicates that its owner, as he works to build a beautiful financial future for his children and family members, will have a decent life on the other hand. Psychology’s interpretation of seeing a salary in a dream The salary indicates that the dreamer must manage his life in a thoughtful and calculated manner and know what he is doing with calculation His money, because he is one of the people who are forced to sustain their livelihood in an honest and correct way without taking a turn and without deceiving others. The vision also shows that you are one of the people who are living under pressure due to financial problems and increasing debts at this time, but your affairs will definitely improve in the near future. The vision A salary in a dream indicates that the person who sees this dream will suffer from a big problem and will be very sad because of an accident that will bring anxiety and sadness to his head. In addition, he will do all the bad things to get money, and enter the path of misguidance and depart from the path of God, and the vision is a warning for him to return to the path. What is correct and abandoning the forbidden and the suspicious. Interpretation of a salary increase in a dream: Seeing a salary increase in a dream means a blessing and indicates that even if the dreamer earns a little money, it will be enough to meet all his needs and make him continue his life without reaching anyone or condemning anyone. The vision also shows that the rich have to take An amount of money and they give it to the needy. At the same time, increasing the dreamer’s pension means increasing his ability to cover his personal needs thanks to the money he earns from his work. Interpretation of receiving a salary in a dream. Whoever sees that he is receiving a salary in a dream, this interprets that the dreamer will enter a job and obtain an organized and continuous income, and that the dreamer will Administrative investments for the future with the money he earns, and that he will buy a house at an early age. It indicates that this person will find solutions that will make him improve his financial situation and know the value of the money in his hand, because it will serve as capital for future institutions. Seeing receiving a salary in a dream indicates that The dreamer will help his family and save money in difficult days. The dream also indicates an increase in material resources and...

title: Interpretation of seeing bathing with someone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing bathing with someone in a dream According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, everyone is certainly concerned with personal hygiene for many reasons, and there are many circumstances that force a person to bathe, such as purity and maintaining cleanliness of the body. Permanently, especially for Muslims because they must perform ablution before prayer. In this article, today we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing bathing with someone in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing bathing with someone in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing bathing in a dream is one of the things Praiseworthy in general, which indicates a person’s deep desire to get rid of sins and transgressions. Also, seeing a bath with hot water means that the dreamer will soon get rid of his sins and sorrows, but if the water is so hot that the dreamer’s body cannot handle it, it means that he will fall into The Great Wuhan Disaster. In the dreamer’s dream he is bathing in front of another person with his clothes completely stripped, his vision indicates that he is exposed to some problems or crises or that he is exposed to something, which exposes his cover and prompts many to stay away from him. . Their relationship with him was severed, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself bathing with another person, fully clothed without taking off, then his vision is a sign of neglect and the burdens that he carries in his soul due to his exposure to some financial crises or dealing with what does not suit him. If the rich person actually sees this vision, then his vision It indicates that he will be exposed to scandal or bankruptcy and the loss of his money as a whole, and if the dreamer is poor, then his vision indicates the accumulation of debts on him and this. He sells his house or land, and God knows best. And if a sinner sees himself as a sinner, bathing in front of another person or in a public place, then his vision shows that his sins are exposed in front of the public, which prompts people to distance themselves from him and cut them off. The relationship with him. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bathing with someone in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman bathing in front of a stranger she does not know, and taking off her clothes without clothes, means that she will be exposed to some attempts at harassment or that she will be exposed in front of some people because of her sins or misbehavior. And her involvement in suspicious relationships. But if an unmarried woman sees that she is bathing in front of a stranger wearing her clothes, then her vision indicates that she has escaped the attempts of some of her bad companions to slander her or someone who is trying to rape her, God forbid. When an unmarried woman sees herself bathing in front of someone she knows, It means that she will soon marry someone she knew before, who may be one of her relatives. Her close fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about seeing herself bathing in front of people for a married woman. A married woman sees herself bathing in front of her husband in one place, which indicates the strength of the feelings of love and tenderness that unite them and the intensity of their attachment to him. But if a married woman sees herself bathing in front of a stranger she does not know, this indicates That she cheated on her husband, God forbid, and that someone exposed her, so she feels very afraid and wants to repent and retreat. . God knows best. Interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of seeing her bathing in front of people. Seeing a pregnant woman bathing with her clothes on in front of the public is from...

title: Interpretation of a broom in a dream: Seeing a broom in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming about a broom shows the loss of money and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, married, pregnant, divorced, or man, such as sweeping dirt, cleaning the house with a vacuum cleaner or a hand broom, and buying a new broom, according to Ibn Sirin and others in the topic. A broom in a dream is one of the dreams that afflict the dreamer with a state of anxiety and confusion, as A broom is used in a dream to clean the floor from dust, and seeing it in a dream is one of the visions that convey a lot. Symbols, indicators, and signs: Through our topic today, we will learn the interpretation of seeing a broom in a dream. Interpretation of a broom in a dream. Seeing a broom in a dream indicates a servant and a person who helps you. Whoever sees that his or her house has been swept away, if there is a sick person in it, he will die, and if he has money, it will be separated from him. If he sweeps the land and collects its waste, dirt, or hay, then it is from the desert if it is his property. Seeing a broom in a man’s dream indicates his wife who helps him in life and organizes it for him. It also symbolizes eyesight. Cleaning dust with a broom in a dream is a sign of getting rid of the difficulties and worries that afflict the dreamer. In his life. Interpretation of a broom in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing using a broom to clean the street floor also shows a lot of goodness and is good news for the dreamer’s life and is good news for good luck. Seeing cleaning the stairs from dust with a broom in the dreamer’s dream is an indication of the good deeds that the dreamer does in his life. Seeing a vacuum cleaner in a dream also symbolizes the goodness that the dreamer will enjoy and the disappearance of pains and problems in his life. This is good news for the near comfort and good luck in a woman’s life. Seeing brooms also symbolizes goodness and profit in professional life, and as interpreters see, it is a harbinger. For positive changes for the better in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of the broom in Al-Nabulsi’s dream. Al-Nabulsi interpreted the dream of the broom that in the dream, if he is cruel, then he disobeys the servants, and the broom shows a slave, so whoever sees that he is cleaning his house with a broom while he is rich, then poverty is feared for him, and it is said: Sweeping the house indicates If a patient dies there, or moves from him to another, or his money is scattered about him, and if he sweeps the land and collects its waste, then he benefits from the money. Otherwise, he is a tax collector or a poor wandering beggar. Perhaps seeing a broom indicates the cessation of worry and distress and the settlement of debts. Interpretation of a broom in A dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interpreted the dream of a broom and said: It indicates a servant, so everything that was in adornment or luster is interpreted by him. Broom: a servant. Total: court clerk. As for sweeping the house or his house if a sick person dies, what if he had money divided with him? And if he sweeps the land and collects its waste, dirt, or hay, because he benefits from the desert if it is his property, otherwise he is a tax collector, tax collector, or poor person asking for a ride. Broom: Show the end of worry and the repayment of debts. If you dream of brooms, this means quick improvements and healthy growth of your wealth. If the vacuums are new. And if you see it in use, you will lose stock speculation. If a woman loses a broom, this portends that she will have a wife

title: Interpretation of seeing the laughter of the dead in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the dead laughing, because death is God’s rule on earth and it is a right, and God created man in this world for trial and distress. Commentators differed in the interpretation of seeing the dead laughing, whether the vision was for a single, married, pregnant or divorced woman, and we will present it today through the vision website or Its interpreters in the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. Website.Interpretation of seeing the laughter of the dead by Ibn SirinFrom the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and the imams of interpretation in visions and dreams. If he sees that his father is alive again, it indicates that the doors of sustenance have opened and relief has come to him from where he does not know. Likewise, if he sees that his dead mother is alive, and once again his anxiety is gone, God paid his debts and brought him comfort. And if the man sees that his daughter is alive again, his livelihood and enjoyment will increase and his worries will go away. Seeing the deceased laughing in a dream indicates that he heard good news about the dreamer, as well as the high status and position that the deceased enjoys in the afterlife. Interpretation of a vision A dead person laughing in a dream for a single woman. If a girl sees that she is joking with a dead relative, this indicates, such as a father or uncle, that the girl has good behavior and stability in her work and emotional life and that she hears good news. If the girl sees that the dead person is frowning on her face, this may portend bad behavior and she must She reconsiders herself and repents to God. If a girl sees that she is talking to the dead, this may indicate that the girl needs sympathy and attention. Interpretation of seeing a dead person laughing in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is joking, then she is dead. This indicates happy news on the way, And good health and family stability. Seeing a dead father laughing in a married woman’s dream expresses her father’s satisfaction with her behavior, actions, and interest in the affairs of her home. Interpretation of seeing a dead father laughing in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees her dead father laughing at her, this may indicate the soonest birth and facilitate and facilitate it. Seeing a pregnant woman Joking with a dead person indicates her marital happiness and financial stability. Interpretation of seeing a dead person laughing in a dream for divorced and widowed women is one: If a widow or divorced woman sees a dead person wearing green clothes and is happy about it, joy indicates good insight and the removal of distress and sadness. Seeing the dead coming out of the graves and they are happy and joyful indicates that the person with insight hears Happy news. Interpretation of a dream about having fun with the dead. Whoever sees in his dream that he is joking with a dead person, this may be an indication of happy news that the dreamer will hear soon, as the vision indicates the death of anguish and distress. Interpretation of a dream about the dead smiling for single people. If a girl sees a dead relative, she will laugh out loud. It appears The high position he reached in Paradise, which is a message to her to follow his path and stay away from disobedience and sins. I dreamed that my dead father was smiling if he saw his deceased father smiling, and this dream is good for the deceased, and for the dead, because the dead shows a high position and status in Paradise, and whoever sees the vision with good news will overcome Adversity. It is not desirable to see the dead wearing dirty clothes, as this indicates worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dead talking

It appears The high position he reached in Paradise, which is a message to her to follow his path and stay away from disobedience and sins. I dreamed that my dead father was smiling if he saw his deceased father smiling, and this dream is good for the deceased, and for the dead, because the dead shows a high position and status in Paradise, and whoever sees the vision with good news will overcome Adversity. It is not desirable to see the dead wearing dirty clothes, as this indicates worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the dead talking

title: Interpretation of a dream about bathing in front of relatives for a married woman

preview.html: The researcher in translation needs a reliable source to interpret what he dreams about, and here I say that you are in the right place. As for the person who bathes in front of her without wearing clothes, it indicates This leads to her marriage to a pious and devout man who watches God inside her. If a single girl wants to see her bathing, but in a far away place, this is evidence that someone embraces her and cares for her. If she sees a woman in his dream bathing without clothes, this is evidence of her marriage, God willing, to a righteous man. His morals. As for seeing her bathing in the dream, and putting on her clothes, this indicates the stability of her life with her husband. Whether she was wearing her clothes while bathing, this is evidence that her secrets have been revealed to her families. , which she was hiding and did not want them to know. If he dreams that he is bathing with his wife, this is a sign of high status and success in his work and many good things will happen to him in his life. Also, if he sees in a dream his wife bathing with clothes on, this indicates her high status and status. title: Interpretation of a dream about taking birth control pills in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about taking medical pills in a dream: The form of the medicine varies and the condition of the medicine differs. It may be a drink, an injection, suppositories, or pills. In a dream, the interpretation of medicines varies according to the details of the medicine. Vision. What is the interpretation of seeing pills in a dream? Interpretation of a dream about taking medical pills in a dream: A pregnant woman who sees that she is drinking medicine during sleep, which indicates ease of childbirth. In a divorced woman’s dream, seeing her drinking medicine indicates that she has gone through a difficult stage in her life and that she will get a great job. When taking pills, it is considered a strong personality and goodwill to those around him. When a young man sees in his dream that he is taking medicine while he is not sick, this is good news that God will stand by his side at all times. Seeing a Bedouin drinking medicine in a dream is a sign that he will leave behind the troubles and exhaustion that he is going through. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a person taking medicine in a dream: An ordinary girl sees someone giving her medicine in a dream to show that she is starting a new life and that she is happy with it. In a married woman’s dream, when she sees that her husband is giving her medicine, this is an indication of her good relationship with her husband and a life dominated by friendship and love between them. When a person sees that he is taking medicine from a person known to him in a dream, this indicates the arrival of goodness in the next period of the dreamer’s life. Seeing a politician taking medicine in a dream means that he has benefited from his country or that he has reached an important position and advanced in his work. Seeing medicine that A well-known person taking it in a dream indicates his benefit, strength, and high status among people, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about buying a drug from a pharmacy in a dream: Seeing an unmarried girl buying medicine from a pharmacy indicates that she is starting a new life or that her marriage is approaching. A pregnant woman who believes that buying medicine from The pharmacy indicates the approaching date of childbirth. In a dream, seeing the purchase of medicines from the pharmacy means that the dreamer will obtain a high position or increase the merchant’s capital. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is buying medicine from the pharmacy, this is evidence of the goodness of her children and the resolution of disputes with her husband. To dream of buying medicine from a pharmacy indicates the abundance of goodness and benefit that the student can reap in his life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about healing a person in a dream: A pregnant woman sees that she is healing a person in a dream, to show an abundance of goodness and livelihood for her and her future child. In the dream of a married woman, Seeing her being treated in a hospital or sanatorium indicates an improvement in her living and social conditions. Seeing a girl in a pot in a hospital being treated indicates the good that she will receive after fatigue and suffering. When a common girl sees in her dream that suction cups are being placed on her, this means that she She will be freed from stress or her marriage is approaching. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is being treated with herbs, this is evidence that she is dealing with crises well with great intelligence and wisdom, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a recipe in a dream: In a married woman’s dream, seeing a recipe indicates the end of marital disputes and psychological comfort. Which you feel

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream and reading Ayat al-Kursi

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream and reading Ayat al-Kursi? Seeing the jinn in a dream has many connotations, some of which may be good and others bad, and this depends on what the viewer sees in detail in addition to his nature, and seeing the reading of Ayat al-Kursi gives this dream other evidence. The symbols that are considered keys for the fortuneteller can understand the meaning of the door standing in front of him and whether it should be opened or not. What concerns us is clarifying the meaning of the jeans and the Throne Verse. And their meeting together in the same vision. Interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream and reading Ayat al-Kursi. The vision of the jinn symbolizes continuous travel and instability in the country or residence in one place, the sea. The jinn symbolizes the person who revolves around the monarch day and night. He never tires of observing him and never tires of following in his footsteps. He stays behind him all the time to catch him or have the opportunity to throw them at him. Seeing the jinn also indicates unseen sciences, knowledge of hidden secrets, and knowledge of excess. Interpretation of a dream about the jinn and reading Ayat Al-Kursi indicates immunity from dangers, an eye that protects the dreamer and does not envy him, and a feeling of peace, comfort, and freedom. From all the problems and obstacles that stood between him and his ambitions. The vision indicates the release of deep-rooted desires and the release of negative accusations that were used to undermine the fortuneteller and ruin his life, as these charges were the main reason for the loss of job opportunities and many disputes in the home and family. And if the fortuneteller sees that the jinn stands In front of his house as if waiting for him, this is a sign of loss, or that the fortuneteller has broken his oath, betrayed the trust, or forgotten the oath. Seeing a genie symbolizes a trickster who plots for others and enchants them at the same time, and who shows the viewer something and then shows others something Completely different from him. The seer can distinguish between the unbelieving jinn and the believer through the verse of the Throne, because this particular verse does not appear to the seer unless there is imminent evil or danger, so the verse is purity, protection, and guidance for him. Likewise, if the faithful jinn appears in a dream, it is not accompanied by fear, and if the individual has fears, these are natural fears that can differentiate them from other fears such as anxiety, tension, psychological, and nervousness. Diseases. Seeing jeans in the market is a sign of fraud in trade, a change in people’s abilities, and a failure to distinguish between permitted and prohibited exploitation. If he sees jinn on the bed, this is a sign of his abandoning the Sunnah of Muhammad and following in the footsteps of Satan without knowing it. Seeing Ayat al-Kursi is the best reminder for him. One of the reasons for waking up and returning to common sense and following only the truth. If the jinn is in the dreamer’s house, then he should recite Ayat Al-Kursi, and if he sees it in his workplace, then he should recite Surat Al-Baqarah. The vision as a whole symbolizes the sword of truth, trust in the living that does not die, and achieving victory. And what is required. If the jinn are evil, then Surah Al-Kursi is the good that triumphs over this evil and returns things to their natural state without breaking the rules or entering into intentions. Interpretation of seeing the jinn in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the jinn in a dream and reading Ayat Al-Kursi by Ibn Sirini

title: Interpretation of dreams that I was a bride and got married in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of marriage for a married woman, or I saw myself married. I saw that I was a bride and I am in fact married to Ibn Sirin. It is more than normal for a girl to see in her dream that she is a bride. This may be the result of her thinking and extreme preoccupation with this matter, but what if a married woman sees that she is a bride? Or not: The meaning of marriage in a dream. Whoever sees in her dream that she is bleeding, this is evidence of imminent death. Whoever sees that she is at a wedding and there is a lot of singing and dancing, then these are poorly interpreted dreams, and indicate the death of one of the relatives or neighbors of the dreamer. As for the Virgin: If she sees a wedding in which there is sadness And crying, this indicates her marriage. If a married woman sees this dream, it is evidence of separation or divorce. Interpretation of a dream that I am a bride for a married woman. Whoever sees in her dream that she is a bride and is already married, this is interpreted as good for her and her family. The dream may indicate the wealth and status that the husband of the dreamer will acquire as a result of trade or The work he does This dream may indicate the good news that someone will give to the dreamer or her realization of something that she was struggling for and longing for. If a married woman is pregnant and sees in her dream that she is a bride, this indicates that she will give birth soon and that things will go well and without problems. And if you see that he is dressed and preparing well for the party, this indicates that the next child will be a boy. If a woman who has children sees in her dream that she is a bride, this may mean that she will marry one of her children. As for the one who was a virgin and saw that she will marry, this is evidence of care. God Almighty bless her, and she will be safe from various diseases of the world. If she is not satisfied with her marriage, this indicates the distress to which she is exposed, and the reason may be the witnesses to her marriage. Interpretation of seeing her as a bride in a dream - YouTube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f9b_Zf9zGpE The dream of a married woman - YouTube

title: Interpretation of war in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: The interpretation of war in a dream for a single woman is the topic of our article today, which we present through an encyclopedia. War is a battle between two parties, both of whom are enemies of the other party, seeking to defeat it with weapons and manpower. Force with the aim of occupying the country and plundering its riches and treasures, and these wars lead to huge losses of life and the spoils of the country and its lands, which raises panic among the people of that country and its people. Seeing war in a dream is one of the disturbing visions that affects the dreamer and makes him wake up in fear. He wonders about the interpretation of this dream out of fear. Its meaning includes the harm that will happen to him or that it will serve him. A warning message about something that the dreamer intends to engage in, so we mention in the following lines the interpretation of an individual seeing war in a dream. Interpretation of war in a dream for a single womanThe following is the interpretation of seeing war in a dream for an unmarried woman: When a single woman sees that she is at war with someone, she It indicates that her marriage is approaching. Seeing an unmarried woman in a war in a dream, but without entering and participating in it, means that the bad news she hears will hurt her. The victory of an unmarried woman in a dream symbolizes the war for excellence in life and acquiring what one desires and seeks. To him. Interpretation of a single woman’s dream about missiles. From what dream interpretation scholars narrated about the unmarried girl who saw projectiles in a dream, we note the following: An unmarried woman fighting using projectiles in a dream indicates the approach of her engagement and marriage. In a dream, an unmarried woman sometimes indicates that she is traveling in search of About knowledge or work. Bombing unmarried women with a missile in a dream symbolizes the hurtful words and rumors to which they are exposed. A shell in a dream for an unmarried woman generally indicates a lack of resourcefulness and need. Interpretation of war in a dream for a married woman. There are many different interpretations for a married woman seeing war. In a dream, we present it below: A married woman who sees that she is at war with her husband in a dream and is stabbed in the stomach indicates that she is pregnant with a baby girl and that God Almighty alone knows what is in the wombs. This dream may indicate that the dreamer will face difficulties and problems in the next life. It indicates A wife who fights her husband in a dream while carrying a sword indicates that she will become pregnant with a male child. The loss of a married woman in a war in a dream symbolizes marital problems that may reach the point of divorce. War in a dream for a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing war in a pregnant woman’s dream varies depending on the circumstances and events of the dream. We will detail this in the following points: Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream means that she is fighting with a sword and a rifle in her hand, for easy childbirth and safety for her and her fetus. War with her husband indicates what the pregnant woman is going through in terms of marital disputes that cause her sadness and pain. Interpretation of a dream about war and escape: Escaping from war in A dream means hearing sad news and falling into problems, while facing war and carrying weapons means overcoming those problems, fulfilling desires, and realizing dreams. Interpretation of a dream about war and bombing: Seeing bombing in a dream means
